players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am the detective and I found Charlie is the mafioso"
You: "I am the mafia, but I don't know who you are. Stay cautious."
Diana: "I am not the mafia. I'm the detective who found Charlie to be the mafioso."
You: "I'm still cautious and will gather more information. Let's see what happens tonight."
Charlie: "Bob was a good guy, I'm the mafioso and you can't trust me."
